about_the_game:
GOT HIGH - Take on the crowd in thrilling brawl, race through labyrinthine traps in races, and battle it out in the arena in thrilling shooter action.
Three unique mini-games in one world full of action and challenges. Are you ready for this multi-level challenge?




Welcome to the world of adrenaline and speed! Get ready for an incredible combination of racing, fighting and shooting in our exciting game.
Feel the rhythm of battle on the road, where every turn can become a test, and every shot determines victory. Drive fast cars, fight opponents using the entire arsenal of weapons and a strategic approach.

The game offers a unique combination of dynamic racing tracks, exciting combat and unexpected turns of events.
Go through an adrenaline-pumping experience and show your skills in a unique survival race.

Immerse yourself in a world of speed, combat and endless possibilities. Welcome to an amazing journey where every second counts and victory depends on you.

Are you ready for this challenge? Ride through danger
fight for victory and become a legend in the world of racing and battle!


Game Features:

  • Variety of mini-games: Three unique game modes in one - fights with the crowd,
    races with labyrinths-
    traps and an arena for shooters.

  • Dynamic Environments: Each mini-game takes place in dynamically changing environments,
    offering a variety of challenges and unexpected situations.

  • Gradual increase in difficulty: As you master each mini-game,
    face increasing levels of complexity and challenges,
    providing gradually increasing interest and motivation.

  • Unique Gameplay Styles: Each mini-game offers a unique play style,
    suitable for different player preferences - from action and speed to tactics and strategy.
    Attention! The game features boxing, shooting at people, and the ability to knock down a person on the track.
    For some countries the game may be 18+.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or equivalent processor
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics 6000
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 14
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics 600
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: GOT HIGH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (with Aero), 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: GOT HIGH - Engage in battle against the crowd in an exhilarating brawl, speed through labyrinthine traps in races, and compete on the arena in an exciting shooter. Three unique mini-games in one world, full of action and challenges. Are you ready for this multi-level challenge?
